column2:
for (fasta_file in fasta_files){
  myarg <- paste0("run --rm -v ./../:/docker_data --rm -v --cpus=4 nanozoo/minimap2:2.28--9e3bd01 sh -c 'minimap2 -ax map-ont /docker_data/",reference," /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/raw/",fasta_file,".fastq > /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/SAM/aligned_",fasta_file,".sam'")   
system2(command='docker',args=myarg)

myarg <- paste0("run --rm -v ./../:/docker_data --cpus=4 nanozoo/samtools:1.20--d1e21ae sh -c 'samtools view -b /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/SAM/aligned_",fasta_file,".sam -o /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/BAM/",fasta_file,".bam'")
system2(command='docker',args=myarg) 

myarg <- paste0("run --rm -v ./../:/docker_data --cpus=4 nanozoo/samtools:1.20--d1e21ae sh -c 'samtools view -b -F 4  /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/BAM/",fasta_file,".bam -o /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/mapped_BAM/",fasta_file,"_mapped.bam'")
system2(command='docker',args=myarg)

myarg <- paste0("run --rm -v ./../:/docker_data --cpus=4 nanozoo/samtools:1.20--d1e21ae sh -c 'samtools sort"," /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/mapped_BAM/",fasta_file,"_mapped.bam"," -o /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/mapped_sorted_BAM/",fasta_file,"_mapped_sorted.bam'")
system2(command='docker',args=myarg)

myarg <- paste0("run --rm -v ./../:/docker_data --cpus=4 nanozoo/samtools:1.20--d1e21ae sh -c 'samtools index"," /docker_data/data_sequencing/2/mapped_sorted_BAM/",fasta_file,"_mapped_sorted.bam'")
system2(command='docker',args=myarg)
}
